description: Sends an email message via a SMTP server.

input.name: stmp host
input.description: The hostname or IP address of the SMTP server.

input.name: stmp port
input.description: The port of the SMTP server.

input.name: stmp username
input.description: The username of the SMTP account.

input.name: stmp password
input.description: The password of the SMTP account.

input.name: stmp secure
input.description: When set to 'True', the connection to the server will use TLS protocol.

input.name: from address
input.description:
The email address of the sender.
Can be plain `sender@example.com` or formatted `"Sender Name" sender@example.com`.

input.name: to address
input.description:
A comma separated list or an array of recipients email addresses.
Can be plain `recipient@example.com` or formatted `"recipient Name" recipient@example.com`.

input.name: text
input.description: The plaintext version of the message.

output.name: message id
output.description: The final Message-Id value returned by the SMTP server.

output.name: response
output.description: Includes the last SMTP response from the server.
